text: Parliamentary elections were held in Slovakia on 25 and 26 September 1998.Nohlen, D & Stöver, P (2010) Elections in Europe: A data handbook, p1747 The elections resulted in the defeat of the Vladimír Mečiar government and the election of Mikuláš Dzurinda as Prime Minister. His party, the Slovak Democratic Coalition formed a coalition government with the Party of the Democratic Left, Party of the Hungarian Coalition, and the Party of Civic Understanding. ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right | colspan=7 align=center| 350px |- ! colspan=2| Party ! Votes ! % ! Swing ! title: 1998 Slovak parliamentary election
